column1: Little Goat Diner////Service was the big problem here
column2: at least at 6 PM at the counter on a Sunday night.  Our waitress poured us glasses of water
column3: then disappeared for 15 minutes while we twiddled our thumbs waiting to order.  Finally flagged down another server to find ours
column4: then waited some more.  When our server eventually re-appeared
column8: what can I get you?" would have gone a long way
column11: "Are you ready to order?" with no indication that she was aware that that yes
column12: we were pretty much ready to order 15 minutes earlier.
